Posts.EditableText: You guys need to cool off.  You should have some fun, and I've taken the liberty of finding a way for you to do so.  Go to [url=http://www.arcamax.com/cgi-bin/reg?source=1206:we2kw9q7]this page[/url:we2kw9q7] and sign up for the [i:we2kw9q7]Garfield Comic[/i:we2kw9q7] under the funnies.  Try it.
Posts.HTML: You guys need to cool off. You should have some fun, and I've taken the liberty of finding a way for you to do so. Go to this page and sign up for the Garfield Comic under the funnies. Try it.
